summary: Young couple Carla (Maestro) and Martin (Leroux) are abducted by three men and spend a terrifying night in Caracas as they wait for Carla's father (Blades) to hand over the ransom.
cast: Mía Maestro|Rubén Blades|Carlos Julio Molina|Pedro Perez|Carlos Madera|Jean Paul Leroux|Dalila Colombo|Elba Escobar|Dimas González|Miguel Ángel Landa|Balmore Moreno|Ermahn Ospina|Rider
title: Secuestro express
